name: Super Sparty Bros
description:
This is a game I developed while taking the online Coursera course Game Design and Development from Michigan State University.

Instructions

The objective is to grab the rose to clear the stage. Along the way you will encounter enemies and hazards that will stand in your way.

Controls
  • Move - Left or Right Arrow Keys
  • Jump - Space Bar
  • Double Jump - Space Bar(midair)
  • Pause - Esc
